Several Far Manager plugins works in the !ConEmu only,
others provides advanced features in the !ConEmu:
  * [ConEmuFarPlugin#ConEmu ConEmu] (main connection between Far and !ConEmu)
  * [ConEmuFarPlugin#ConEmu_Panel_Views ConEmu Panel Views]
  * [ConEmuFarPlugin#ConEmu_Underlines ConEmu Underlines]
  * [ConEmuFarPlugin#PanelColorer PanelColorer]
  * [ConEmuFarPlugin#FarColorer FarColorer]

===!ConEmu===
!ConEmu.dll (or !ConEmu.x64.dll) provide next functionality:
  * Shell style Drag-and-Drop;
  * Tabs and window switching;
  * Some plugins depends on on ([http://code.google.com/p/far-plugins/wiki/FarHints FarHints], [http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/wiki/PicView PictuewView], [http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/wiki/MMView Multimedia Viewer], etc.);
  * It shows real console, on abnormal !ConEmu.exe termination;
  * It attach new real console, which appears after detach (Ctrl-Alt-Tab);
  * Shows long console output;
  * and so on.

!ConEmu plugin itself have no configuration dialog. All its features are available
via Far Manager plugin menu (F11), You'll see it as «!ConEmu».

*!ConEmu plugin menu* <br>
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuFarPlugin.png" title="ConEmu FAR plugin" alt="ConEmu FAR plugin">

«Attach to !ConEmu» is available only in «clear» console, when You starts FAR without !ConEmu.

===!ConEmu Panel Views===
Enables thumbnails and tiles in Far Manager panels.
<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuPanelViews.png" title="ConEmu Thumbnails and Tiles">

Recommended way for Panel Views activation is Far Manager macro (look at `Thumbnails.reg` in !ConEmu folder).

Another way (direct) is Far Manager plugin menu (F11) («!ConEmu Panel Views» item):

<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuFarTh.png" title="ConEmu Panel Views plugin">.

You may polish Panel Views appearence via !ConEmu [Settings#Views Settings].

===!FarColorer===
This [http://colorer.sourceforge.net/farplugin.html plugin] works in plain Far Manager too,
but when You choose [http://forum.farmanager.com/viewtopic.php?p=1041#p1041 Far TrueMod]
and run it under !ConEmu - You got full true colors in Far editor
instead of standard 16 (or 32 with [Settings#Colors Extend foreground colors] option) console colors.

*Note*, You must enable [Settings#Colors Colorer TrueMod support] option.

<img src="http://conemu-maximus5.googlecode.com/svn/files/ConEmuTrueMod.png" title="ConEmu & FarColorer TrueMod">.
